milestones.description: Clive Lloyd has broken the record for most sixes (8) in ODIs, going past Ian Chappell's 7
Clive Lloyd has broken the record for most sixes in an innings (3) in ODIs for WI, going past Clive Lloyd's 2
West Indies's 51-run win against England is the largest margin of victory in terms of runs in ODIs, beating 36-run win against England
Fredericks has broken the record for playing the most ODIs (11) for WI, going past Holder
Clive Lloyd has broken the record for most sixes in an innings (3) in ODIs, going past Hadlee's 2
Clive Lloyd and Greenidge's 88-run partnership is WI's highest for the 3rd wicket in ODIs, breaking the record of 68 between Clive Lloyd and Viv Richards
